import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Menu=()=>{// Define the menu data for the restaurant
const restaurantMenu=[{name:"Dish 1",price:"Rs 100",key:"1"},{name:"Dish 2",price:"Rs 1200",key:"2"},{name:"Dish 3",price:"Rs 80",key:"3"},{name:"Dish 4",price:"Rs 1005",key:"4"},{name:"Dish 5",price:"Rs 900",key:"5"},{name:"Dish 6",price:"Rs 101",key:"6"},{name:"Dish 7",price:"Rs 130",key:"7"},{name:"Dish 8",price:"Rs 1400",key:"8"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Menu - Restaurant"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"menu-list",children:restaurantMenu.map(dish=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"menu-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:dish.name})," - ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:dish.price})]},dish.key))})]});};export default Menu;
